title: Muthoot Microfin records 32% YoY asset growth, loan collection efficiency soars
description: Muthoot Microfin, a listed pure-play microfinance lender, reported a 32% year-on-year growth in assets under management (AUM) along with a significant improvement in loan collection efficiency, leading to enhanced profitability. Its AUM reached Rs 12,194 crore by the end of March, with loan disbursement rising by 32% to Rs 10,662 crore in FY24.
